caption.center: STATE OF MISSOURI, RESPONDENT, v. RANDY LEE BORDELON, APPELLANT.

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM THE CIRCUIT COURT OF COLE COUNTY; BRYON L. KINDER, JUDGE.
opinion.attorneys:
J. Bryan Allee, Columbia, for appellant.
William L. Webster, Atty. Gen., Elizabeth L. Ziegler, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before SHANGLER, P.J., and KENNEDY and FENNER, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] Appeal from conviction of forcible rape, ยง 566.030.1, RSMo 1986, and from a sentence of five years imprisonment.
[2] Affirmed. Rule 30.25(b).Page 579
